channel.title: Server Movies Humor Gmail on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Server Movies Humor Gmail on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: importing your old mail into gmail :: go cart action
item.description: so today over lunch I decided it would be a good idea to import my old email into gmail. it rules. check out the tool that I am using. written by mark lyon. it works pretty well - albeit very slow. but whatever. I will just have it go in the background. my server has a lot of bandwidth. seriously. this is pretty bad. i have listened to twisted sister’s “burn in hell” a billion times today and it isn’t getting very old.
